aboutMe.name: Khudolozhkin Alexander
aboutMe.about: Hello, I'm an app developer based in Moscow!
aboutMe.work: I work as a freelancer on app and video creation. I love everything about product launches, from planning and design to solving problems with code. Currently, I live by working as a video editor. In my free time, I work on my own product
aboutMe.2021: Enrolled in NUST MISiS on “Computer Science and Engineering”

works.futhelper: Application for automatic trading of FIFA cards with a subscription system.
works.NeedForCode: IT show from Roman Sakutin and IJunior team. Test the developers for strength in a drift car! (participated as video editor)
works.CodeInPoke: IT show in which programmers answer questions (participated as video editor)

posts.error: Not yet( but at some point they will.

futhelper.name: FutHelper
futhelper.about: The main functionality of the application is the automatic buy and sale of cards in FIFA. It is implemented using a browser extension. The interface is built right into the official FIFA WEB application.
info: NodeJS, React Next js 13, vanilla JS

nfc.name: Need for Code
nfc.about: A large and interesting project with multi-camera editing and a quadcopter, as well as interesting twists and turns. I did editing, graphics, effects.

cip.name: Code in poke
cip.about: A show in which programmers competed by answering questions. Made multi-camera editing and effects.
